/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The vantage point is from an elevated position, providing a panoramic view of the cityscape below. The street below is a hive of activity, with cars and trucks navigating their way through the thoroughfare. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds, adding a serene backdrop to the urban hustle below.
